She is applying for a loan amount of Php 20,000 and praying that her request will be granted. She promised to use the amount for the said purpose and pay it back to the best of her ability.

She wants to increase her sales and expand her store in the next few years. She is a faithful member of Center for Community Transformation. Microentrepreneurs, like Josephine, are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 members. They meet on weekly basis to share the goodness of God in their lives and their experiences on the very unique work of transformation that CCT offers.

loans.use: to pay for groceries, beverages and toiletries for resale.

loans.name: Soleha

texts.en: Soleha was born in 1974. She is a kind and hardworking woman. Soleha is married and the parent of 2 children. Soleha has worked more than 2 years in a local school. She is a cleaning woman. Soleha works hard and does her job well. She is asking for a loan of 2000 Somoni as her husband is seriously ill and he needs treatment for his health. Soleha awaits your generosity which she needs.

loans.use: to buy medicines for treatment of her husband.

loans.name: Aloha

texts.en:
Aloha works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Aloha requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more packs of pork chicharon to sell.

Aloha has been in this business for three years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more packs of pork chicharon to sell.

loans.name: Celedonia

texts.en:
Celedonia is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Celedonia is 57 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Celedonia has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell in her vegetable stall.

She has been in this business for 20 years. Celedonia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell at her stall.

loans.name: Estelita

texts.en: Estelita is 63 years old and married with nine children. She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Estelita is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies for raising her pigs. Estelita has been in pig fattening for 10 years and also earns additional income from general store. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough and provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies for raising her pigs

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en: Myrna is 56 years old and married. She works very hard to provide for her family. Myrna runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 7000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items for resale such as canned goods, cigarette, home care products and other groceries. Myrna has been in this business for 20 years now and sells a variety of items. In the future, Myrna would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items for resale such as canned goods, cigarette, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Shamim's Group

texts.en:
Shamim is a 38-years old lady; living with her husband and three children in the area of Lahore Pakistan. She is a very poor and needy woman. Her husband provides sheltering services to earn money to feed her entire family. He has been doing this business for many years and been using wooden planks, bamboos which has depreciated over time. Now her husband is unable to continue his business without new wooden boards and bamboos. Therefore, Shamim has requested a loan for her husband so that her husband can buy new wooden smooth boards and bamboos to continue his business again. She hopes that this loan will bring positive changes in her life and her husband will earn maximum profit with the help of this loan. 
Shamim is very thankful to the Kiva and field partner because they help empower her husband to buy new sheltering materials. This loan will bring positive changes in Shamim life and she assures us that she will pay all installments on time as usual. Shamim is very thankful to Kiva for this honorable support.

loans.use: to buy sheltering material such as wooden smooth boards and bamboos etc for providing sheltering services

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is a married woman who lives a simple life with her family in Tubigon, Bohol. She is a mother of five children aged 14, 12, 10, 4 and 2. Her husband works hard as a farmer to support them while Liza successfully starts a small sari-sari (variety) store where she sells basic commodities.  Liza describes her biggest business challenge as having insufficient capital, which is the reason why she is asking for a loan. 

Liza will buy commodities such as drinks, eggs, spices, cooking oil, sugar, salt, noodles, canned goods, toiletries and snack foods. With the help of this loan, she will able to improve her store, increase her sales and augment her profit.

loans.use: to buy drinks, eggs, spices, cooking oil, sugar, salt, noodles, canned goods, toiletries and snack foods.

loans.name: Rabia

texts.en: Rabia is a 50-year-old woman, living with her five children and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her son is a driver by profession and provides transportation services by using a three wheeled auto rickshaw. With the help of savings, he has purchased a used auto rickshaw. Its engine quality is good but the body is totally damaged. He does not have sufficient cash in hand to buy a new body and seat covers. He wants to start driving it and is looking for a lump sum amount to buy a rickshaw body. Therefore, Rabia has requested a loan for her son so that he can buy a new rickshaw body and can drive the rickshaw smoothly. She hopes that now her son will be able to generate more income. Rabia is very happy after taking this loan. She thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw body for her son's transportation services.

loans.name: Agustinha

texts.en:
Agustinha is requesting a loan of $800 to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as rice, sugar, body lotion, hair oils, cooking oil, water, noodles, coffee, soft drinks and other things to sell according to what people like. 

Agustinha started her kiosk business a few years ago, with her own working capital. She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to buy more goods. She will increase her income with this loan.

loans.use: to buy stock such as rice, sugar, body lotion, water, hair oils, cooking oil, water, noodles, coffee, and cigarettes.

loans.name: Robina

texts.en:
Robina is the age of 49, living in the area of Lahore. Her family is involved in assembling and selling wipers usable in floor cleaning. Her husband brings rubber, metal frames and nuts and bolts for assembling wipers. After making them her husband sells these wipers to retailers.

Due to inflation her husband wants to increase his supply but he does not have cash in hand for purchasing materials. This is the reason Robina has requested a Kiva loan from Kiva's field partner so he can sell more wipers and fulfill all the basic needs of the family.

Robina appreciates lenders for this honorable support.

loans.use: to buy rubber, metal frames and nuts and bolts for her husband so he can assemble wipers and sell them at the market.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rosa is 44 years old and all five children attend school.

Rosa has a general store business in the Philippines. Rosa requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Seher

texts.en:
Seher is a 26-year-old woman, residing in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a mother of two children. She is a house wife and looks after her family at home. Her husband provides shutter services for building making. In this regard her husband needs raw material such as soldering rods, welding rods, iron rods and sheets for manufacturing accessories to improve his shuttering work so that he can generate more income to financially support his family. Seher is applying for a loan from Kiva's field partner on behalf of her husband. 

Seher is thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy shuttering material such as soldering rods, welding rods, iron rods and sheets for her husband's shuttering services.

loans.name: Mtaji Wa Masikini Group

texts.en:
Victor is a married man with 2 children, in his late 20's. One child attends school. He has been buying cattle to slaughter and sell at wholesale price for nine years He works from 5 am until 10pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Victor's 8th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to increase his cattle stock and has managed to successfully repay all his loans. He is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group which is doing great. He used the profit to pay school fees, repay the loan, buy a plot of land, cover household expenses, and buy a TV set and sofa. He will use this loan to increase his cattle. He dreams of becoming an international business man.

Victor will share this loan with his 2-member group Mtaji wa Masikini who will hold each other accountable to repay the loan.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa requests $800.00 to improve her business. She has a kiosk and regular, daily customers. She needs to buy soap, detergent, milk, candles, eggs, sugar, coffee, sauces, sardines, noodles, cigarettes, candies, soft drinks and other items to sell.

She has had this business for a few years. Running a business has made Elisa independent because she can be responsible for her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy soap, detergent, milk, candles, eggs, sugar, coffee, sauces, sardines, noodles, cigarettes, candies,  soft drinks and other items.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is a 46-year-old married woman with three children, two attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Anita has had a food vending business for 9 years and needs 50,000 PHP through NWTF to buy vegetables, fish, and meat.

In the future, Anita would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy  vegetables, fish, and meat.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a 38-year-old married woman with three children.

Gemma works hard to provide for her family by running a general store for 3 years. She requests a 13,000 PHP through NWTF to buy groceries to sell.

Gemma has borrowed and repaid 7 loans from NWTF. She earns additional income raising pigs.

Gemma aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rubina

texts.en:
Rubina is a 37-year-old, married woman living with her husband and three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is a very talented lady who excels in sewing. She is appreciated in her community. Some years ago, she started a tailoring business to help meet household expenses. She works hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Rubina requests a loan Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles, and scissors to make more dresses and increase her earnings.

Rubina wishes to spend her earnings on providing a quality life to her family members.

Rubina is thanks to Kiva and field partner BRAC pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase  spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles, and scissors.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn lives a simple life with her family in the town of Tubigon, Bohol. She is married with two children who are 13 and 10 years old. She sells fish from her husband's catch. They have been doing this for 11 years to earn a living and provide for the needs of their children.

Marilyn asks for a loan to buy a fishing net to help them improve their catch and increase their sales. Her goal in life is to enhance their livelihood to have better lives in the future.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net.

loans.name: Hazel

texts.en:
Hazel is a 34-year-old married woman with three children, one attends school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Hazel has had a manicure and pedicure business for 4 years and requests 11,000 PHP through NWTF to buy a nail cutter, nail polish, and other materials for her business.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy a nail cutter, nail polish, and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Kifayah

texts.en:
Kifayah is a 46-year-old married woman with 7 children, four attend school. She runs a grocery store in Al-Magher in the city of Jenin. Kifayah started the grocery business 2 years ago to improve her family's standard of living. Her husband is a worker and was the only breadwinner of the family, so Kifayah started the grocery business to help her husband. She sells food and cleaning materials.

Kifayah says that the challenge for the business is high competition. She requests the loan to buy necessary items and products for the store. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her to improve her family's living status. In the future, Kifayah would like to expand and improve her business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy  products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Elizita

texts.en:
Elizita lives in Dili B and has a restaurant. Her restaurant is located in the center of the market, she earns a good income, has regular customers, and is very happy with her business.

She is applying for a loan of $ 1000.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business because she wants to open a bigger restaurant in the future. She opened her restaurant a few years ago with her own working capital. She is taking this loan because she wants used to buy rice, beef, pork, fish, chicken, herbs, eggs, cooking oils, noodles, and other items for the restaurant.

loans.use: to buy items for her business.

loans.name: Leena

texts.en:
Leena is an English language student who needs a loan to cover her educational expenses.

This is her story: "My name is Leena. I am 21 years old and live with my family in Zarqa. I could not found suitable work to support my studies. I chose this major because I have wanted to work as an English teacher since I was young. I need the loan because my parents don’t have the means to pay for my expenses. If I don't get it I will have to stop going to college. This loan is very important to me because with it I will have the opportunity to finish my education, be a good in English, and find good work. My goals are to be volunteer in one of the charitable associations to help those in need and to complete my higher education.

loans.use: to pay for her education expenses.

loans.name: Samia

texts.en:
Samia is living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan, with her spouse and seven children. Her husband owns a small jewelry shop to sell precious gemstones for rings, earrings, and necklaces. He presents his jewelry under a display glass case to attract customers.

He is the family's sole source of income and needs to pay utility bills, school fees of his children, and household expenses. His customers demand the latest fashion jewelry which he cannot purchase due to high cost.

Samia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan for her husband to buy expensive costume jewelry which will enable him to increase his earnings.

Samia hopes to build a house so that her family members may live their lives comfortably. She is very thankful to Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, because they showed her a beam of hope to fulfill her desires.

loans.use: to help her husband  purchase jewelry for his jewelry shop.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a 54-year-old woman who lives in Poblacion Sinacaban. She lives with her children and grandchildren because she has separated from her husband. She has 13 children and some of them are married. She helps her daughter to earn a living.

In 2008, she became a member of GDMPC and the money they borrowed last year was used to start a lumber business but unfortunately the business did not earn an income. But despite of this, they successfully repaid their loan. Now she has a garden to grow vegetables, papaya, squash, and tomatoes. She plans to borrow money from GDMPC to buy fertilizer and to pay labor costs in order to have a good harvest. The income from this garden helps her to support the needs of the family. If the income of this business will be good next year, she plans to repair their house for her grandchildren to be comfortable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and  pay for  labor costs.

loans.name: Mwajuma

texts.en:
Mwajuma a widow in her early 60's with five grown up children and two grand children who attend school. She has been a food vendor for twenty years and works from 7 am to mid-day daily. She is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Mwajuma's 10th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase the food stock and has managed to successfully repay her loans. She is happy with the loan and used the profit to pay her grand children's school fees, repay loan, renovated her small house, and cover household expenses. She will use this loan to restock the out of stock items in the food store. She dreams of improving her life style and staying healthy.

Mwajuma will be accountable for repaying her loan.

loans.use: to restock the out of stock items in the food store.

loans.name: Erna

texts.en:
Erna is a 42-year-old married woman with two children, one attends school, Erna works very hard to provide for them.

Erna has run a general store for 4 years and requests 19,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, snack foods, and personal care products.

In the future, Erna would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, snack foods, and personal care products.

loans.name: Ana Francisca

texts.es: Ana de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 7 años tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos y los buenos precios con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Ana is 31 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her husband.

Ana has been making a living selling clothes for seven years. She has many customers owing to the variety of products that she sells, and the good prices.

With profits from sales, Ana is able to cover some household costs.

Ana is applying for a loan in order to buy clothes in bulk and thus earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk.

loans.name: Mirna Araceli

texts.es: Mirna de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hija, ella se dedica desde hace 2 años a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mirna is 31 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her life partner and daughter.

Mirna has been making a living producing tortillas for two years. Her business is near her home and she has many customers. With profits from sales, Mirna is able to cover some household costs.

Mirna is applying for a loan in order to buy corn by the hundredweight and lime. With this loan, she can continue to produce tortillas and earn a higher income in order to enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn by the hundredweight and lime.

loans.name: Heriberto

texts.es: Heriberto de 61 años de edad, reside en vivienda propia en la cual ha vivido durante 15 años. Él es un hombre muy trabajador quien se dedica a la venta de diferentes prendas de vestir, este negocio lo administra desde hace 20 años y es la fuente principal de sus ingresos. Es por ello que Heriberto solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: delantales, manteles, gabachas, etc. para aumentar las ventas y así también las ganancias de su negocio.
texts.en:
Heriberto is 61 years old and lives in a house that he owns. He has been living there for 15 years.

Heriberto is very hard-working and makes a living selling different clothing items. He has been managing this business for 20 years, and it is his main source of income.

Heriberto is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy aprons, other clothes for cooking in, and tablecloths to increase sales and profits at his business.

loans.use: to buy aprons, other clothes for cooking in, and tablecloths to increase sales and profits at his business.

loans.name: Sandra Carolina

texts.es: Sandra de 30 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 5 años, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra is 30 years old and a single mother. She lives with her son in a house that she owns.

Sandra has had a small shop in her home for five years. She has many customers owing to the good prices, and her friendliness when serving customers.

Sandra is applying for a loan in order to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet breads and more. She can thus earn a higher income in order to enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet breads and more.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica a la confección de ropa desde hace 6 años, su taller de costura lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, gracias a su trabajo es como ha podido salir adelante con los gastos de u hogar, la clienta esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de mas hilos, agujas, variedad de tela, botones, elásticos, etc. y asi seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Sandra is 42 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her husband and daughter.

Sandra has been making a living producing clothes for six years. Her dressmaking workshop is located in her home. Thanks to this work, Sandra has been able to move forward and pay household expenses.

Sandra is applying for another loan in order to buy more threads, needles, buttons, elastic, materials, and more and to continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy more threads, needles, buttons, elastic, materials, and more.

loans.name: Maria Elsa

texts.es: María de 36 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia en compañía de sus dos hijos de 2 y 8 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado poner un negocio de venta de insumos básicos con los que ha sacado adelante a sus hijos brindado todo lo necesario para su crecimiento y desarrollo, además de cumplir con los gastos de servicios básicos del hogar. María desea diversificar sus productos y poderles ofrecer a sus ya numerosos clientes más variedad permitiéndole generar más ventas por lo que también incrementarían sus ingresos económicos, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: granos básicos (arroz, maíz, frijol, azúcar, sal), golosinas, bebidas (refrescos en lata, gaseosas), paletas de sabores, etc. Para poder generar más ventas y lograr incrementar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
María is 36 years old and lives with her children, ages eight and two years old, in a house that she owns.

María is hard-working and, with a lot of effort, she has managed to open a business selling staple goods. This business has allowed María to move forward with her children, and to provide what they need to grow and develop well. She is also able to pay basic household costs.

María wants to diversify the range of products on offer at her business, and to offer her many customers more variety. This will allow her to generate more sales and, therefore, increase her income.

María is therefore applying for a loan in order to buy staple goods (rice, beans, corn, sugar and salt), plus sweets, drinks (canned and fizzy drinks), ice lollies and more. She can thus increase sales and her income.

loans.use: to buy staple goods (rice, beans, corn, sugar and salt), plus sweets, drinks (canned and fizzy drinks), ice lollies and more.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: Patricia de 36 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia en compañía de su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 5, 18 y 21 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que con mucho esfuerzo ha sacado adelante a sus hijos brindado todos los insumos necesarios para su crecimiento y desarrollo así como también cumpliendo con los gastos de servicios básicos del hogar, todo esto gracias a que posee una pequeña panadería y que gracias a que es una mujer amable se ha ganado el cariño de sus clientes lo que le ha permitido ser muy conocida en su comunidad. Patricia desea invertir en la compra de materia prima (harina, jaleas, azúcar, levadura, huevos, etc.) al por mayor para poder incrementar sus ventas así como sus ingresos y poder brindarles más variedad de productos a sus clientes, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: la compra al por mayor de harina, jaleas, azúcar, levadura, huevos, etc.
texts.en:
Patricia is 36 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her husband and three children, ages 21, 18 and 5 years old.

Patricia is enterprising and, with a lot of effort, she has provided necessities so that they could grow and develop. Patricia has also been able to pay household expenses.

Patricia has been able to do all of this because she has a small bakery. As she is so friendly, Patricia has won the affection of her customers, and become very well-known in her community.

Patricia wants to invest in basic supplies (flour, jelly, sugar, yeast, eggs and more) in bulk in order to increase sales and her income. She wants to offer a greater variety of products to customers, and is therefore applying for a loan in order to invest in flour, jelly, sugar, yeast, eggs and more.

loans.use: to invest in flour, jelly, sugar, yeast, eggs and more for her bakery.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora de 38 años de edad  que habita en vivienda propia en compañía de sus dos hijos de 5 y 15 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica a la crianza y venta de pescado tilapia, negocio que le permite brindarles todos los insumos básicos a sus hijos, así como cumplir con los gastos de los servicios básicos con los que cuenta en su hogar. Dora desea invertir en el negocio de la venta y crianza del pescado tilapia así como también comprar mariscos de manera de diversificar sus productos y lograr que su negocio crezca brindando mejor calidad de productos a sus números clientes que la conocen y recomiendan logrando así que sus ingresos económicos aumenten, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir: la compra de pescado tilapia, mejorar los criaderos de tilapia, alimento, compra de mariscos, etc., para poder generar un crecimiento en sus ventas e incrementando sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Dora is 38 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her two children, ages 15 and 5 years old.

Dora is hard-working. She makes a living raising and selling Tilapia fish, a business that has allowed her to provide her children with basic necessities and to pay for utilities in her home.

Dora wants to invest in her Tilapia business, and to buy seafood, in order to diversify her products and expand her business. She wants to provide better quality products to her many customers who know and recommend her. By doing all this, Dora wants to increase her income.

Dora is therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI so as to buy Tilapia fish, improve the pool used for raising the fish, and to buy feed, seafood and more. She can thus increase sales and her income.

loans.use: to buy Tilapia fish, improve the pool used for raising the fish, and to buy feed, seafood and more in order to increase sales.

loans.name: Richard

texts.fr:
Richard le brave père de famille très responsable vous remercie beaucoup pour le crédit. Le crédit a été utilisé pour acheter des marchandises générales supplémentaires, le fonds de roulement a été renforcé.  Malheureusement, une maladie un peu grave l'a frappé il y a environ deux mois et la famille a eu un peu peur. Mais maintenant, il est bien rétabli et le pire est passé, la vie  et la lutte continuent.
Son projet est de développer toutes les activités: le magasin général, l'élevage ainsi que la culture dans le but d'améliorer le revenu afin de pouvoir réaliser le rêve d'offrir une meilleure condition de vie à la famille.
texts.en: Richard, a brave and responsible father, thanks you for the loan. It was used to buy additional merchandise, which strengthened his business's working capital. Unfortunately he developed a serious illness two months ago that frightened his family. Now, however, he has recovered and the worst is behind him. The struggle of daily life continues. He will continue to develop and strengthen his various lines of work - the general store, farming and agricultural work - with the goal of increasing his earnings and fulfilling his dream of improving his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed, rice, sugar, dried cassava, bananas, etc.

loans.name: Tahiriniaina

texts.fr: Tahiriniaina veut reprendre un autre prêt pour acheter 4 cyclo-pousses et les louer. C’est une autre activité en plus qui générera un revenu en plus pour sa famille.  En effet, elle peut toujours continuer son activité de vente d’articles diversifiés. Le prêt précédent a été bénéfique pour elle, car elle a pu assurer la rentrée scolaire et augmenter son niveau d’épargne. Elle espère qu’avec le bénéfice de ce prêt, elle arrivera à construire une maison.
texts.en: Tahiriniaina wishes to take out another loan in order to buy 4 pedicabs, which she will rent out. This additional business venture will generate a new source of income for her family. She will also continue her business of selling a diverse assortment of merchandise. Her previous loan was very helpful, allowing her to ensure her children's education and to contribute to her savings. With the extra earnings that she will bring in thanks to this loan, she hopes to be able to build a house.

loans.use: to buy 4 pedicabs to rent out.

loans.name: Hernando

texts.es:
Hernando con 29 años de edad,de estado civil soltero, vive en casa de sus padres de material rústico, en el distrito de Santo Tomás,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú.El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la cría, engorde y venta de ganado vacuno, contando a la fecha con 4 cabezas de ganado vacuno, con una experiencia en el rubro hace 6 años. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría y venta de animales menores (gallinas, cuyes), así mismo se dedica al cultivo de productos de pan llevar (yuca, plátano, vituca) siendo estos últimos para su consumo y en ocaciones para la venta. El destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra de ganado vacuno (2 novillas) para luego engordarlos y venderlos a un mejor precio para obtener un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende tener mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Hernando es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa.El firma con aval.
texts.en:
Hernando, 29 years old and single, lives in his parents' rustic house, in the district of Santo Tomás, Province of Cutervo, Department of Cajamarca, Perú. He counts on very good personal and work-related references from the inhabitants of the area. The majority of the inhabitants work in agriculture, commerce, and cattle raising.

He raises cattle, fattens them up, and sells them. To date he has 4 head of cattle. He has 6 years of experience in the field. Additionally he grows and sells smaller animals (chicken, guinea pigs). He also grows food crops (yucca, plantains, vitucas), which are for his consumption and occasionally for sale.

The objective of the loan will to be to invest in the purchase of cattle (2 heifers) to later fatten them up and sell them at a good price, obtaining a better volume of sales. In this way he would have better income to improve his quality of life.

Hernando is a new partner for Edpyme Alternativa. He signs with endorsement.

loans.use: buy cattle (2 heifers) to later fatten them and sell them at a good price

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan de 37 años de edad, vive al lado de su hermana y su sobrina. Él es una persona quien busca la manera de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, por lo que se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado bobino. Este negocio lo maneja desde hace 10 años por lo que se ha convertido en su fuente principal de ingresos. Juan en busca de mejorar sus ingresos solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en compra de ganado bobino para poder aumentar su ganancias.
texts.en:
Juan is 37 years old and lives with his sister and niece. He is someone who looks for a way to improve his and his family's quality of life, which is why he works raising and selling cattle. He has run this business for 10 years and it has become his main source of income.

After looking for a way to improve his income, Juan applied for a loan from FUSAI. He will use it to buy cattle so he can increase his earnings.

loans.use: to buy cattle to increase his earnings

loans.name: Rakoto

texts.fr:
Rakoto est un homme fervent de 71 ans. Il est marié et vit avec sa femme en ville. Il a eu 12 enfants qui sont tous mariés actuellement. Pour assurer sa vie quotidienne, il exerce une activité de confection de jantes de pousse-pousse et cela depuis 10 ans.
Rakoto a déjà pris plusieurs prêts chez Vahatra, dont les bénéfices lui ont permis d’acheter un terrain. Pour ce prêt, il compte acheter du fer plat, des tubes en fer et des rayons de vélo pour confectionner des jantes de pousse-pousse. 
Il espère gagner beaucoup de bénéfices afin d’assurer ses vieux jours en mettant de l’épargne de côté. Son rêve est de construire une maison sur le terrain qu’il a acheté.
texts.en:
Rakoto is a devoted 71-year-old married man who lives in the city with his wife. He has 12 children who are now all married. For the past 10 years he has been making a living by building and selling pedicab wheels. 

Rakoto has already taken out several loans through Vahatra [a Kiva field partner], which allowed him to buy land. With this new loan he plans on buying flat sheets of iron, iron tubes and bicycle spokes in order to build pedicabs. 

He hopes to increase his earnings so that he can save money for his retirement. His dream is to build a house on the land that he bought.

loans.use: to buy flat sheets of iron, iron tubes and bicycle spokes in order to build and sell pedicabs.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS EMPRENDEDORAS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Mauricia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de chamarras, venta de zapatos, salón de belleza, tienda de barrio, venta de productos medicinales, servicio de transporte, venta de ropa.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Mauricia es integrante, ella indica que ingreso Pro Mujer por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia varios años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de gaseosas y golosinas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializara en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The not for profit group 'Las Emprendedoras' (The Entrepreneurs) will begin their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Villa Exaltación regional hub. The group is made up of eight members and is directed by a board of directors of which Mauricia is president. The members of the group run various businesses and include selling jackets and shoes, running a beauty salon and a neighbourhood grocery store, selling medicinal products, providing a transport service and selling clothes.

The loan will benefit the group of small micro-businessowners of whom Mauricia is a member. She says that she joined Pro Mujer after being invited by a friend who is a client of the institution. At the moment Mauricia runs a neighbourhood grocery store which she says she learnt how to run using her own initiative some years ago.

This loan will be used to increase her working capital (buying soft drinks and lollies in bulk) which she will purchase from vendors in the city of El Alto and later resell in her store. This line of work allows her to generate an income to support her family financially, as she lives with her partner and has two children.

When asked what she liked about Pro Mujer, Mauricia replied that she liked the training and the health service that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and lollies in bulk

loans.name: Soanasolo

texts.fr:
Soanasolo est une paysanne dynamique de 50 ans. Elle vit à la campagne avec son mari et ses 2 enfants à la campagne. Elle cultive du riz, du maïs et des haricots. Elle élève des porcs et de la volaille. 
Elle a pris des prêts chez Vahatra auparavant pour cultiver du riz, l’alimentation de base des malgaches. Elle a pu acheter un terrain et une rizière avec les bénéfices des prêts. Actuellement, elle a besoin de capital pour cultiver des haricots et développer son élevage porcin en achetant 4 porcelets à engraisser.
Avec ce prêt, Soanasolo pense être autonome dans ses activités de culture et d’élevage.
texts.en: Soanasolo is a dynamic farmer, who is 50 years old. She lives in the countryside with her husband and two children, and she grows rice, corn and beans. She also raises pigs and poultry. She has taken loans from Vahatra before in order to grow rice, the staple food of the Madagascans. She has been able to buy a plot of land and a rice field with the profits she has made as a result of the loans. Currently she needs capital to grow beans and develop her pig-raising activity by buying piglets to fatten up. With this loan Soanasolo thinks she will be able to become autonomous in her farming and animal raising activities.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds, fertilizers and four piglets, as well as food to fatten them.

loans.name: Jean Louis

texts.fr:
Jean Louis est un homme souriant de 42 ans. Il est marié et élève 6 enfants à la campagne. Il cultive du riz pour nourrir sa famille mais aussi pour vendre afin d’avoir une rentrée d’argent pour sa famille. Il pratique aussi l’élevage bovin et porcin.
Jean Louis a déjà pris plusieurs prêts chez Vahatra ou il a pu développer son élevage porcin. Il a pu louer des rizières pour augmenter la récolte de riz. Avec ce prêt, il compte acheter 2 vaches et l’alimentation de ses 2 vaches. 
Il espère gagner beaucoup de bénéfices afin de constituer beaucoup d’épargne pour assurer l’avenir de ses 6 enfants.
texts.en: Jean-Louis is a cheerful man, who is 42 years old, married and raising six children in the countryside. He grows rice to feed his family, but also to sell, so he has an income for the family. Furthermore, he raises cattle and pigs. Jean-Louis has already had several loans from Vahatra which have allowed him to develop his pig-raising activity. He has also been able to rent rice fields so he can increase his rice production. With this loan he is planning to buy two cows and food to feed them. He hopes to be able to make a lot of profits so he can build up significant savings to provide for his six children's future.

loans.use: to buy two cows and food for them.

loans.name: Ashurbi

texts.ru: Ашурби обращается за кредитом, чтобы купить стройматериалы и отремонтировать дом. Она надеется, что с помощью кредита сможет вовремя закончить ремонтные работы. Ее муж работает строителем домов и сам займется ремонтом дома. Нужно купить только материалы. В дом приносит доход ее муж от своих услуг и Ашурби за счет предоставления услуг портнихи. Ашурби надеется, что может получить кредит и они с мужем отремонтируют дом.
texts.en: Ashurbi is applying for a loan in order to buy construction materials and renovate her home. She hopes that with the help of a loan, she will be able to complete renovation works in time. Her husband works as a home builder and will carry out the renovations personally. They only need to buy materials. The family's income is from her husband's work, as well as Ashurbi's tailoring services. Ashurbi hopes that she can receive a loan, and she and her husband will renovate their home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and renovate her home

loans.name: Nigina

texts.ru: Милая, добрая, опрятная, вкусно готовит и имеет приятный голос - это все про Нигину. Имя Нигина обозначает драгоценный камень. Действительно для ее мужа и ребенка она драгоценна. Нигина замужем и имеет одного ребенка. Ее муж работает в Российской Федерации, и каждый месяц отправляет деньги на семейные нужды. Из-за экономики двух стран деньги, которые он высылает, не хватает и Нигина подрабатывает портнихой. Скоро придет зима и нужно подготовить дом, чтобы сохранить тепло в холодный период года. Нигина собирается купить стройматериалы и отремонтировать дом. Нигина надеется, что сумеет успеть завершить ремонт до зимы.
texts.en:
Sweet, kind, tidy, great at cooking, and possessing a pleasant voice - this is Nigina. The name Nigina means 'precious stone'. Indeed, to her husband and child she is precious. Nigina is married and has one child. Her husband works in Russia, and every month he sends money for the family's needs. Because of the economic situation of both countries, the money that he sends is insufficient, and Nigina works as a tailor on the side. 

Winter is soon coming and the home needs to be prepared so that it can keep warmth during the year's cold period. Nigina intends to buy construction materials and renovate her home. Nigina hopes that she will be able to complete the renovations in time before winter arrives.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and renovate her home

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy equipment and ingredients for their bakery

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.es: Esmeralda de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella tiene un negocio de salón de belleza desde hace 5 años en su lugar de residencia trabaja de lunes a viernes y tiene mucha clientela pues trabaja muy bien, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, ella solicita un crédito para poder comprar productos para su salón de belleza como: cremas, shampoo, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, entre otras cosas que necesita y así podrá obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Esmeralda is 44 years old and lives in her own home with her three children. She has run a beauty salon from home for the last five years. She works from Monday to Friday and has many clients because she does a good job. With her earnings she is able to pay for the household bills.

Esmeralda is applying for a loan to buy products for her beauty salon such as creams, shampoo, hair ties, scissors and other items that she needs. With this she can have a higher income which will allow her to have greater financial stability.

loans.use: to buy creams, shampoo, hair ties, scissors and other items.

loans.name: Lalie

texts.fr:
Lalie est une veuve de 37 ans qui prend en charge seule son enfant. Depuis 2 ans, elle exerce une activité de vente de vêtements friperie au grand marché. 
Cela fait 5 ans qu’elle est emprunteuse chez Vahatra. Avec les bénéfices, elle a pu finir la construction de sa maison. Pour ce prêt, elle va acheter 5 balles de vêtements friperie qu’elle va vendre au détail au grand marché. 
Les bénéfices seront mis de côté pour pouvoir faire face aux imprévus et assurer l’avenir de sa fille.
texts.en: Lalie Is a 37-year-old widow who has sole care of her child. For the past two years she has been selling second-hand clothing at the large market, and she has been a borrower from Vahatra for the past five years. With the profits she has made, she has been able to finish building her house. She is going to use this loan to buy five bundles of second-hand clothing, which she will sell on a retail basis at the large market. The profits she makes will be put aside to provide for unforseen events and her daughter's future.

loans.use: to buy five bundles of second-hand clothing to sell at the large market.

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru: Шавкат добродушный  мужчина в возрасте 50 лет. Он женат  и имеет троих детей. Все его дети уже взрослые и имеют свои семьи. Шавкат живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Несмотря на свой возраст, он полон сил и желания работать на благо своей семьи. Шавкат  занимается деканством и животноводством. У него имеется  земельная площадь, которая  составляет около 12 га.   На этой земле Шавкат занимается выращиванием моркови, картошки и зерновых культур. А его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот.  Так как земельная площадь у них большая, они также пасут на ней своих скот. Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Шавкат хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Шавкат заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Shavkat is a well-disposed 50-year-old man. He is married and has three children. All his children are adults and have their own families. Shavkat lives with his family in a modest house in a farming village. In spite of his age, he is full of energy and desire to work for the good of his family. 

Shavkat works as a farmer and in animal husbandry. He has a land plot, which is about 12 hectares large. On this land Shavkat cultivates carrots, potatoes, and grain crops. His wife helps him with caring for and rearing the livestock. Since their land plot is large, they also pasture their livestock on it. 

The animal husbandry business brings in good income, thus Shavkat wants to expand this business by increasing his livestock headcount. Thus he has applied to Arvand in order to receive a loan to buy livestock. Shavkat thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Khadisa

texts.ru: 21 летняя Хадиса  из района Кубадиен. Она молодая жена и невестка. Хадиса вышла замуж за дехкана. На районе дехканы. Хадиса сейчас занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью вместе с мужем. Ее муж выращивает скота и работает на земле. Сама Хадиса не смотря на свой молодой возраст, занимается скотоводством. Уже 2 года Хадиса выращивает крупнорогатого скота.  Она успевает на все, делает домашнюю работу, доить коров и работает на земле. Таких девушек мало встретишь. Ее доходы только от скотоводство. Животноводство перевезет больше и хороший доход. Хадиса решила приобрести несколько скота и расширить деятельность. Ей нужно определенная сумма денег для приобретения несколько скотов. Хадиса решила взять кредит и достичь своих целей.
texts.en:
21-year-old Khadisa is from Qubadiyon district. She is a young wife and daughter-in-law. Khadisa is married to a farmer, in a district of farmers. Khadisa now does farming with her husband. Her husband rears livestock and works on the land. 

Khadisa works in animal husbandry in spite of her young age. Khadisa has been rearing large cattle for two years. She is successful at everything, does the household chores, milks cows, and works on the land. Such girls are rare. Her income is only from animal husbandry. Animal husbandry brings in a large and good income. 

Khadisa has decided to purchase some cattle and expand her business. She needs a certain sum of money for purchasing some livestock. Khadisa has decided to take a loan and reach her goals.

loans.use: to buy some livestock

loans.name: Mavoariniaina

texts.fr:
Mavoariniaina est une femme âgée de 37 ans. C’est une femme sérieuse dans son activité de restauration car c’est ce qui lui permet d’assurer la vie quotidienne de son mari et de ses 3 enfants. 
Cela fait 17 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité de restauration. Ce prêt va lui servir à acheter des ingrédients tels que des légumes et de la viande. Elle compte aussi acheter quelques ustensiles de cuisine comme des marmites et des assiettes. 
Elle espère augmenter le nombre de clients en diversifiant les plats. Son objectif est la réussite scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en: Mavoariniaina is a 37-year old woman. She is serious about her restauration work, as it allows her to provide for her husband's and three children's daily lives. She has been carrying out this restauration activity for the past 17 years. This loan is going to be used to buy ingredients, such as vegetables and meat. She is also planning to buy some kitchen equipment, such as pans and plates. She hopes to increase the number of her customers by diversifying the dishes she offers. Her goal is to see her children succeed at school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, such as vegetables and meat, as well as equipment for her restaurant.

loans.name: Jean Juste

texts.fr:
Jean Juste est un homme souriant de 37 ans. Il vit en concubinage avec 4 enfants à charge dans un quartier de la ville. Cela fait 5 ans qu’il exerce une activité d’élevage porcin ce qui lui permet de nourrir sa famille et d’assurer la scolarisation des enfants.
Pour ce prêt, il compte acheter de la provende pour engraisser ses porcs et qu’il va vendre au bout de 6 mois aux bouchers du grand marché qui sont ses clients fidèles. 
Sa priorité est le bien-être de sa famille et l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Jean-Juste is a cheerful man who is 37 years old. He lives together with his partner and four dependant children in one of the town's districts. He has been raising pigs for the past five years and this has allowed him to feed his family and pay for his children's schooling. With this loan he is planning to buy animal food to fatten up his pigs, which he will sell after six months to butchers at the large market, who are loyal customers. His priority is his family's well-being and his children's education.

loans.use: to buy 650 kilos of animal food to fatten up pigs.

loans.name: Las Roba Corazones Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS ROBA CORAZONES” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Copacabana, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Lidia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son la venta de queso y venta de leche.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Lidia es integrante, ella indica que integra Pro Mujer  por la invitación de un promotor que es personal de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de leche; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió de su mamá y decidió emprender su propio negocio hace más de quince años. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para la compra de una vaca lechera, que adquirirá de las vendedoras de su comunidad, esta compra le beneficiara en el aumento de producción de leche de su ganado para posteriormente comercializarlo a una empresa de lácteos. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The 'Las Roba Corazones' not for profit group will begin their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Copacabana regional hub. It is made up of eight members and is run by a board of directors of whom Lidia is president. The members of the community association run businesses selling cheese and milk.

This loan will benefit the group of small micro-business owners which Lidia is a part of. She says that she joined Pro Mujer after being invited by a promotor who worked for the institution. At the moment she runs a business selling milk. She says that she took over this business from her mother and decided to set up her own business over fifteen years ago.

The current loan will be used to buy a dairy cow which Lidia will purchase from vendors in the community. This purchase will benefit her by increasing her herd's milk production which she will later sell to a dairy company. This line of work allows her to generate an income to support her family financially since she is married and has three children.

When asked what she liked about Pro Mujer, Lidia replied that she liked the training the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing, cosmetics, perfume, and other items.

loans.name: Angela Estela

texts.es: Ángela de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos sobrinas ellas trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, la clienta se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de pupusas desde hace 15 años, su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, ella esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de mas materia prima como: maíz, frijoles, quesillo, chicharrón, tomates, etc. y asi seguir con sus ventas para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Ángela is 56 years old and lives in her own home with her two nieces, who work and help her economically. She has been making a living selling pupusas (stuffed corn tortillas) for 15 years. Her business is located in a residential area, and she has many customers.

Ángela is requesting a new loan to buy more ingredients like corn meal, beans, cheese, chicharrón (pork rinds), tomatoes, etc. so that she can keep selling her products and earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like corn meal, beans, cheese, chicharrón (pork rinds), etc.

loans.name: Mavjudahon

texts.ru: Мавчудахон опытная рукодельница. Она из города Турсунзаде. 5 лет Мавчудахон занимается шитьем женской одежды на заказ. По ее словам ремесло стало ей любимой занятиям. Сидя дома она зарабатывает, и обеспечить свою семью. Ей основной заказывает девушки, которые выходящие замуж. Мавчудахон наслаждается со своей работой. Это ремесло успокаивает ее. Она научила дочку к этому ремесло. Ее дочка тоже занимается шитьем национальной женской одежды. Мавчудахон хочет расширить свою деятельность. Она просит кредит для купли ткани и другие швейные принадлежности.  Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ее приобрести необходимые средство и ускорить процесс работы.
texts.en:
Mavjudahon is an experienced seamstress. She is from Tursun-zoda city. Mavjudahon has been sewing women's clothes to order for five years. This trade has become her favourite occupation. Sitting at home, she earns money and provides for her family. She is mostly commissioned by young ladies who are getting married. Mavjudahon enjoys her work. This work calms her down. She has taught her daughter this trade. Her daughter also earns a living sewing national women's clothes. 

Mavjudahon wants to expand her business. She has requested a loan to buy materials and other sewing supplies. The requested loan will help her to purchase the needed materials and expedite her work process.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and other sewing supplies

loans.name: Ozodaoy

texts.ru:
Озодаой жизнерадостная и ответственная женщина. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Вместе со своей семьёй Озодаой живёт в сельской местности. Сама Озодаой  по профессии швея. Она очень любит своих детей, и старается обучать их от всего своего сердца, потому что она желает видеть образованных детей. Но зарплата, которую она получает, недостаточна для покрытия всех имеющихся нужд в семье. Озодаой, вот уже несколько лет сотрудничает с Арванд. Она получала кредит на потребительские нужды, а также на развитие своего бизнеса. Озодаой говорит, что после того, как она начала сотрудничать с Арванд, качество её жизни стало постепенно улучшаться.
 В данное время Озодаой хочет отремонтировать дом, где они живут, чтобы улучшить условия для проживания. Но собственных средств у неё недостаточно. Для этого Озодаой обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Ozodaoy is a responsible woman full of joie de vivre. She is married and has three children. Ozodaoy lives with her family in the countryside. Ozodaoy is a seamstress. She loves her children very much, and tries to educate them with all her heart, since she wants her children to be educated. But the wages she receives are insufficient for covering all the family's needs. 

Ozodaoy has been cooperating with Arvand for several years. She has received loans for consumer needs, and for expanding her business. Ozodaoy says that after she started cooperating with Arvand, her quality of life has gradually improved. Currently Ozodaoy wants to renovate her home in order to improve her living conditions. But she does not have sufficient funds. Ozodaoy has applied to Arvand, and wants to receive a loan to buy construction materials for renovating her home. She hopes for a positive outcome and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to renovate her home

loans.name: Parbati

texts.en:
Parbati, 36 years old, is married and has three children, aged 12,7 and 2. Many years ago, she established her grocery shop business. Working seven days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid seven loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent loan to buy grocery goods. In the future, she plans to uplift her family's economic condition. She thanks you for your support.

In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy. Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home. While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen. Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins. By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods

loans.name: Thúy

texts.en:
Mrs Thúy is 26 years old and she is married.

She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for 5 years.Thúy lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.
Her family is a low-income household in village, moreover the market need is low in this region. She has no collateral cause can't get loan from other banks or credit institutions.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

In 2014, Thúy joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Thúy has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.
With her business profit, Thúy hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy pigs and supplies

loans.name: Phonsonmhong Group

texts.en: Vixian understands the difference the water filter can make for his family and for his group’s families.  Vixian knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  The water filter Vixian purchased will increase his family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood.  The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    Vixian is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for 2 years – so he and his group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Atanacio

texts.en: Atanacio lives in Maliana and he is a businessman. He became involved in business activities a few years ago, with his own working capital, and he makes the best of it. He is very interested in doing business, and he has a small store. He hopes to open a bigger store but he does not have enough capital, so he is requesting a loan of $1500 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve his business.  He will use this loan to buy additional items to keep in his store including detergents, sugar, cooking oils, hand & body lotion, aqua, candies, cigarettes, lighters, and other things to sell. He is taking this loan because he also wants to improve the management of his business in the future.

loans.use: to buy detergents, sugar, cooking oils, hand & body lotion, aqua, candies, cigarettes, lighters, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Maiwada

texts.en:
Maiwada is a Babban Gona maize farmer.  Maiwada is excited that Babban Gona offers a lasting solution to ending the cycle of poverty, renewing his dreams of gaining wealth someday. 
Traditionally, Maiwada would have had to sell his maize at Harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. As a member of Babban Gona Maiwada can store his maize at harvest and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. Benefiting from Babban Gona’s marketing support, Maiwada has the opportunity to generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. 
Maiwada is thankful that he no longer has to worry about having had no money to purchase better inputs to improve his yield and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 64 years old and widowed with five children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Wilma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase groceries for her store like bread, canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, and snack foods to sell. She has been in this business for one year.

In the future Wilma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell in her store such as bread, canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, and snack foods.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 61 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Merlinda runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like candy, snack foods, home care products, and groceries. She has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Merlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like candy, snack foods, home care products, and groceries.

loans.name: Nelinda

texts.en:
Nelinda is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Nelinda is 53 years old and has one child still in school.

Nelinda has a fishing business in the Philippines. Nelinda requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish net, gasoline for her boat and maintenance for her business.

Nelinda has been in this business for 5 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish net, gasoline for her boat and maintenance for her business

loans.name: Ghafooran

texts.en:
Ghafooran is the age of 53, mother of seven children and living in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a religious, sympathetic, honest and hard worker. He is running a small herbal store in nearby town to the help of the poor people. He wants to help poor people this is the reason he decided to open a herbal medicine store in poor society. Such poor people, who do not have money to afford medicine. He can treat against the minor diseases also at very low services charges and provides the herbal medicines according to his experience. In this way he gets some income to run his house as well.

He is very famous in his area due to his kindness; this is the reason the demand for herbal medicine has been increasing and need to buy more herbal medicine to cope with the demand. He wants to buy herbal medicine in bulk but does not have enough capital to invest because he has to spend his large part of savings over household expenses.

Therefore, Ghafooran requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan; so her husband can buy herbal medicines in bulk. She hopes that the lenders would support her husband for this noble work.

loans.use: to buy herbal medicines in bulk for her husband's herbal store.

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia is 37, married, and has five children. She has a small clothing business that she started in her house. Her husband is working with a low income and she is helping him to provide good life to her family specially that Jordanian and Syrian refugees are competing in the labor market. Because Syrians are accepting lower salaries, many business owners are not hiring as many Jordanians as before.And monthly salaries now range between 120-150 dinars.

Now Nadia has requested loan to buy winter clothes for the season.

loans.use: to increase the merchandise she has by buying more winter collection of clothes

loans.name: Hermelina

texts.en:
Hermelina is 59 years old, married with four children.

Hermelina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, snack foods and other personal care products.

Hermelina has borrowed and paid 10 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Hermelina aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, snack foods and other personal care products

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en:
Irshad is 40 years old and lives at her husband's home along with her four sons. Her husband is a driver by profession, providing transportation services in the main city. He has been driving over local and unpaved roads; due to jerks and continuous driving, his rickshaw's body is badly damaged. Passengers do not like to travel in his ugly looking vehicle and do not feel tranquil in it because his rickshaw rattles during driving. He wants to replace his rickshaw's body with a new one but does not have enough cash in hand.

This is the reason that Irshad has requested a Kiva loan from field partner BRAC Pakistan, so her husband can buy a new rickshaw body which is made of polyester. She hopes that after replacement, her husband will be able to drive the rickshaw smoothly. Irshad praises Kiva's system and supporting lenders.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw body for her husband so he can get rid of the rattling noise from his old rickshaw body.

loans.name: Bekaman

texts.en:
Bekaman is a freshman in the Psychology Program at AUCA. It has been his dream to study at AUCA for many years. He considers AUCA as a best choice for him because it is close to his interests, goals and values. He sought for a good education, taught in English and found that the AUCA is the only such place in Kyrgyzstan. English plays an important role for Shaktybek in terms of job seeking.

Also the educational system in English attracts students from all over the world and gives an opportunity for him to travel and study abroad. He could go abroad and get a degree there, but the main reason of his stay in his motherland is his mother, with whom he lives. In addition to this he loves Kyrgyzstan and wants to make a positive impact on its economy by opening his office and developing small towns in the country.

Shaktybek understands that he needs to develop some his features as speaking, knowledge in developing and running a business, for that he is going to take some classes of Business Administration Department.

Shaktybek thanks all Kiva lenders for the given chance to join the AUCA community and be among the similar value seekers and leaders of the country. He appreciates your attention and knows that it is so important for him with a single mother, to be openhearted and receive the aid, which can be returned after graduation by him.

loans.use: to pay for his BSc. degree in Psychology.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Joan Mae is 18 years old and is the second of four children in the family. Her mother Mary Jane supports the family through her fishing business in the Philippines.

Joan Mae is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Accountancy and is currently in the first year of this four-year course.

Mary Jane is borrowing 8,000 PHP to pay tuition fees for the first semester of school.

When she graduates, Joan Mae plans to be gainfully employed.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's tuition fees.

loans.name: Asma'

texts.en: Asma' is 36 years old and married with three children, two of whom are currently attending school. She lives in Beit Omar in Hebron city. She works alone in her grocery store. Asma' has been in her business for one year and she sells home necessities like food and cleaning materials. Asma' says that the two main challenges for her business are limited liquidity, and selling on credit to local customers. She requested the loan to buy necessary goods for the grocery store. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her improve her family's status. In the future, Asma' would like to expand her store to a supermarket.

loans.use: to buy some goods for her grocery store.

loans.name: Erlinda Del Carmen

texts.es: Erlinda de 30 años de edad, vive al lado de su madre de 52 años y su hija de 12 años de edad. Ella es madre soltera quien en busca de mantener la economía del hogar y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, se dedica a la venta de ropa para dama y caballero y venta de zapatos. Este negocio lo administra desde hace varios años de forma ambulante dentro y fuera de su comunidad. Erlinda desea mejorar su condición de vida para lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: blusas, pantalones, camisas, faldas, etc. para aumentar su mercadería y de esta forma aumentar las ganancias.
texts.en:
Erlinda is 30 years old and lives together with her 52-year-old mother and her 12-year-old daughter. She is a single mother who, in order to support her household and to improve her family´s quality of life, sells clothes for men and women as well as shoes. She has run this business for several years

For some time she has run the business as a street vendor from inside and outside of her community. Erlinda wants to improve her living conditions and she is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in: blouses, pants, shirts, skirts, etc. in order to increase her merchandise and therefore profits.

loans.use: invest in: blouses, pants, shirts, skirts, etc. in order to increase her merchandise and therefore profits.

loans.name: Karla Vanessa

texts.es:
Karla actualmente se encuentra soltera y no tiene hijos, pero tiene la responsabilidad de cuidar de sus padres y apoyarlos económicamente, no tiene ayuda de remesas para subsistir, su negocio propio es una tienda en la que vende a sus vecinos granos básicos, boquitas, azúcar, dulces, etc., la cual fundo por la necesidad de tener una fuente de ingresos, atiende a sus clientes de siete de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde, sus padres le administran el negocio, ya que ella es empleada de un supermercado, la foto que se está publicando fue tomada mientras cumplía con su jornada de trabajo.
El crédito lo utilizara para comprar básicamente bebidas, pan, galletas, huevos, harina, dulces entre otros productos que le sean de ayuda para atraer a nuevos clientes, pretende tener un inventario bien surtido para que su negocio sea más reconocido en la comunidad y le genere nuevos ingresos para ir cancelando sus deudas.
Karla tiene entre sus sueños ampliar su negocio lo suficiente para lograr estabilidad económica y darles a sus padres una vida más digna.
texts.en:
Karla is currently single and doesn't have children, but she has the responsibility of caring for her parents and supporting them economically. She doesn't have the help of remittances to subsist, her own business is a store where she sells basic grains, snacks, sugar, sweets, etc., to her neighbors, which she established from the necessity of having a source of income. It serves the customers from seven in the morning to four in the afternoon. Her parents run the business since she is an employee in a supermarket. The photo which is being published was taken while she was doing her shift at work.

The loan will be used basically to purchase drinks, bread, cookies, eggs, flour, sweets, and other products which will be helpful to attract new customers. She plans to have a well-stocked inventory so that her business is more recognized in the community and generates new income to pay off her debts.

Karla has among her dreams to expand her business sufficiently to achieve economic stability and to give her parents a more dignified life.

loans.use: to basically purchase drinks, bread, cookies, eggs, flour, sweets and other products that will be helpful to attract new customers.

loans.name: Rolen Yovany

texts.es: Rolen, de 48 años de edad, es casado, tiene un hijo con su esposa con quien vive en un sector del municipio de Choloma Cortes. Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio desde hace 15 años, actualmente se dedica a la compra de plomo para la elaboración de (anzuelo) herramientas de pesca de diferentes estilos y tamaños. Esta actividad la realiza en su casa. Él solicita la cantidad de 21,000 Lempiras para invertir en la compra de plomo al por mayor para aumentar el inventario de materiales y fabricar más anzuelos para la pesca. Es la oportunidad de comprar a bajo costo y obtener mejores ventas y ganancias. Su meta es que su hijo se gradúe de sus estudios  y hacer crecer más su negocio y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Rolen, 48 years old, is married and has a child with his wife and lives in a sector of the municipality of Choloma Cortes. He has always worked in business for the past 15 years, currently he works purchasing lead to make fishing tools (hooks) of different styles and sizes. He does this work in his home. He asks for the quantity of 21,000 lempiras to invest in the purchase of lead in bulk to increase his inventory of materials and to make more fishing hooks. This is the opportunity to purchase at low cost and get better sales and earnings. His goal is that his son graduates from his studies and to grow his business more and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase lead to make fishing hooks.

loans.name: Nayfeh

texts.en: Nayfeh is a 52-year-old, married woman with five children, and lives in a sector in Jordan called Madaba. Nayfeh is selling ready-made clothes in her home. Her project started many years ago, and she runs her business alone. She is also making pickles to sell for extra income. She is working hard to help her husband provide a good life for her children, and she has to save money to provide a good education for her kids. The purpose of applying for the loan is to buy more ready-made clothes to sell, and increase her profits so she will be able to help her husband more.

loans.use: to add more clothing items to her merchandise, mostly her winter collection.

loans.name: Joaquina

texts.en: Joaquina is married and she has a very keen interest in doing business. She has been involved in business activities since 2010, with her own working capital of $70, and she has made the best of it. She has a small store, and she is requesting a loan of $1000 from Tuba Rai Metin to add to her working capital because her capital is not enough. She will use this loan to buy additional items to keep in her store including sauces, sardines, soy sauce, detergents, aqua, toothpaste, electric balloon, soaps, hand & body lotion, biscuits, milk, soft drinks, and other things to sell. With this loan  she wants to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy sauces, sardines, soy sauce, detergents, aqua, toothpaste, electric balloon, soaps, hand & body lotion, biscuits, milk, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Yover

texts.es:
Yover con 29 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente,vive en casa propia de material rústico,junto a su cónyuge y sus tres hijos,en el distrito de Santo Tomás,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura,especificamente al cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 1 hectárea de variedad Catimor, resistente a enfermedades y plagas, plantación esta en SU segundo año de producción, cultivo de café lo realiza en el caserío de El Pueblo Lo Hizo distrito de Santo Tomas, con una experiencia en el rubro hace más de 08 años. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría de animales menores (gallinas, cuyes) y cultivo de productos de pan llevar (yuca, plátano, vituca) para su consumo y en ocasiones para la venta, ademas trabaja como peón agrícola.
