El destino del crédito será para invertir en el mantenimiento y cultivo de 1 hectárea de café en producción, asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2016, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas. De esta manera obtendrá mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar calidad de vida de él y de su familia.

Yover es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa. El firma con su cónyuge.
texts.en:
Yover, 29 years old, is partnered and lives in his own house of rustic material with his partner and three children, in Santo Tomás district, Cutervo province, Cajamarca department, in the country of Peru. He has very good personal and work references from the people in the zone. The inhabitants of this place work primarily in agriculture, trade, and raising animals.

He works in agriculture, specifically growing coffee, having to date 1 hectare of the Catimor variety, resistant to disease and pests. His plants are in their second year of production, he cultivates his coffee in the village of El Pueblo Lo Hizo, in Santo Tomás district, with 8 years of experience in the field. Additionally, he works raising small animals (chickens, guinea pigs) and grows food crops (yucca, plantains, vituca) for his consumption and sometimes to sell, and he also works as a farm laborer. The loan will be destined to invest in the maintenance and cultivation of 1 hectare of coffee in production, assuring a good production in the 2016 season, reflected in a greater sales volume. In this way, he will get more income and, so, be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

Yover is a new borrower for Edpyme Alternativa. He co-signs with his partner.

loans.use: to invest in maintaining and cultivating 1 hectare of coffee in production.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Virginia is 51 years old now.

Virginia has a buy-and-sell frozen foods business in the Philippines. Virginia requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy a variety of frozen foods to sell such as hotdogs, ham, etc.

She has been in this business for four years. In the future, Virginia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of frozen foods to sell such as hotdogs, ham, etc.

loans.name: Joceta

texts.en:
Joceta is 49 years old and married with two children, one of whom is still in school. Joceta works very hard to provide for them.

Joceta runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, snack foods, and personal care products.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Joceta has been in this business for eight years and also earns additional income from ready-to-wear clothing.

In the future Joceta would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo, snack foods, and personal care products.

loans.name: Fredy Orlando

texts.es:
Fredy es el propietario de una peluquería, las actividades de su negocio las desarrolla solo, con la ayuda de un amigo aprendió el oficio, ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en el negocio y es su fuente de ingresos. Él es soltero y aún vive con sus padres, pero los apoya con los gastos familiares.
Para tener un negocio más competitivo solicita un crédito que utilizara básicamente para comprar cremas para el cabello, talcos, prestobarbas, etc., para contar con material suficiente para atender a sus clientes, el resto le será de utilidad para hacerle reparaciones a su vehículo propio, pues así se podrá movilizar con facilidad a comprar lo que necesite o cuando tiene emergencias familiares, espera mantener con vida su negocio y tener estabilidad económica.
Sus deseos son aprender a trabajar con créditos para crecer junto a su negocio y seguir aportando para que sus padres tengan un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Fredy is the owner of a barber shop, he does the work of his business alone, with the help of a friend he learned the trade, and now has a lot of experience in the business and it is his source of income. He is single and still lives with his parents but he supports them with the family expenses.

To have a more competitive business, he asks for a loan which he will basically use to purchase hair creams, talcum powder, razors, etc. to have sufficient materials to serve his clients. The rest will be useful to make repairs to his personal vehicle because then he will be able to get around more easily to purchase what he needs or when he has a family emergency. He hopes to keep his business running and have economic stability.

His desire is to learn to work with loans to grow with his business and continue contributing so that his parents have a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase hair creams, talcum powder, razors, etc., to have sufficient material to serve his clients.

loans.name: Matilde Leonor

texts.es:
Matilde Leonor con 49 años de edad,de estado civil casada,vive en casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus hijos, en el distrito de Mocupe,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cuyes, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace más de 02 años. Adicionalmente percibe ingresos de arriendos de su terreno. Así mismo trabaja como nana cuidando a un joven (22 años) con síndrome de down. Solicita préstamo para una mejora en su vivienda, ya que se han beneficiado con techo propio. De esta manera obtendrá una mejor calidad de vida.

Matilde Leonor es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Matilde Leonor, 49 years old, is married and lives in her own house with her husband and children, in the district of Mocupe, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque department, in the country of Peru. She has very good personal and work references from the people in the zone. The inhabitants of this place work primarily in agriculture, trade, and raising animals.

She works raising and selling guinea pigs, with more than 2 years of experience in this field. Additionally, she gets income from renting her land. She also works as a carer for a young man (22 years old) with Down Syndrome. She asks for the loan for an improvement to her house, since they have benefited from their own house. In this way she will get a better quality of life.

Matilde Leonore is a return borrower for Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to improve her house, since they have benefited from their own house.

loans.name: Clara

texts.es:
Clara con 52 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, junto a su mamá y papá, en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica al comercio de artículos para el hogar, artículos de bazar y ropa. Adicionalmente comparte con su mamá la pensión por viudez. Solicita préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa y perfumes para su negocio. De esta manera obtendrá mayor venta y atención a sus clientes, y así poder generar ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida para ella y sus padres.

Clara es socia nueva para Edpýme Alternativa. Tiene experiencia crediticia con tarjetas de crédito las cuáles las realizó con pagos puntuales.
texts.en:
Clara, 52 years old, is single and lives in her parents' house, with her mother and father, in the district of Cayaltí, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque department, in the country of Peru. She has very good personal and work references from the people in the zone. The inhabitants of this place work primarily in agriculture, sales, and raising animals.

She works in sales of items for the home, miscellaneous items and clothing. Additionally, she shares shares the widow pension with her mother. She asks for a loan to invest in the purchase of clothing and perfumes for her business. In this way, she will get more sales and serve her customers better, and so be able to generate income for a better quality of life for herself and her parents.

Clara is a new borrower for Edpýme Alternativa. She has credit experience with credit cards which she uses with punctual payments.

loans.use: to invest in clothing and perfumes for her business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Elizabeth is 44 years old and has two children who are currently in school. Elizabeth has a direct selling Avon products business in the Philippines. Elizabeth has requested a PHP 25000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more products such as lotion, shampoo, body soap and more from Avon to resell to her customers. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Elizabeth has been in this business for 15 years now. In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more products such as lotion, shampoo, body soap and more from Avon to resell to her customers

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en: Cristina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Cristina is 69 years old now. Cristina has a buy-and-sell spices business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 25000 loan amount through NWTF to buy a variety of spices for resale. Cristina has been in this business for 15 years now. In the future, Cristina would like to build and expand her business to further secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of spices for resale

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Anita is 41 years old and has one child currently in school. Anita has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 12000 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts and other materials needed in her business. Anita has been in this business for 5 years now. In the future, Anita would like to build and expand her business to further secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and other materials needed in her business

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina está solicitando un nuevo financiamiento con el que podrá invertir en granos básicos, aceite, bebidas, azúcar, sal, entre otro tipo de mercadería que sus clientes demandan en su negocio, el objetivo de Reina es mantener a sus clientes satisfechos y tener el sustento diario para su familia.
El crédito anterior le ha servido para mantenerse trabajando y ampliando la tienda con nuevos productos, sus ingresos han mejorado, su familia se mantiene unida y sin dificultades de salud.
texts.en:
Reina is applying for a new loan that she will use to buy basic grains, oil, beverages, sugar and salt, among other types of merchandise that her clients demand in her store. 

Reina's goal is to keep her clients satisfied and to earn a living for her family. The prior loan was helpful to keep her working and to expand the store with new products. Her income has improved, her family is holding together and without health problems.

loans.use: to invest in basic grains, oil, beverages, sugar and salt, among other types of merchandise that her clients demand in her store.

loans.name: Fredisminda

texts.es:
Fredisminda, está optando por un nuevo crédito para poder comprar ollas, cacerolas, cucharas y una plancha, la finalidad de la inversión es renovar el equipo de trabajo para la venta  de panes con pollo, tiene fe en que las ventas se mantendrán y así tendrá ingresos para continuar disminuyendo las necesidades de su familia.
Para ella el préstamo anterior le dio un aporte muy importante con el que pudo comprar otros artículos necesarios para agilizar sus actividades y aumentar su productividad, así ha logrado mantener el flujo de las ventas y mejorar un poco las circunstancias familiares, comenta que su núcleo familiar se mantiene igual.
texts.en: Fredisminda has applied to a new loan to buy diverse pots, spoons and a grill in order to renovate her work materials for her business of selling chicken sandwiches. She hopes her sales will remain stable, and in this way to have income to continue reducing her family's needs. The previous loan gave her an important impulse. With it, she was able to buy other needed items to liven her business activities and increase her productivity. This is how she has been able to maintain a flow of sales and to somewhat improve the family circumstances. She comments that her nuclear family has stayed the same.

loans.use: to buy diverse pots, spoons and a grill in order to renovate her work materials for her business of selling chicken sandwiches.

loans.name: Irenia

texts.en: A $800.00 loan is offered to Irenia to improve her business. Irenia lives in Liquisa. She is married and is a business women. Most of her daily income is from selling pigs so she is happy to do her business. She started her business a few years ago with her own working capital. With her husband, she was going to add money to their principal amount in order to buy more pigs, because it has become their business activity. She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital and buy more pigs in the future. She will have management help for her business. She is busy with her business every day.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en: Mildred is 43 years old and married with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Mildred has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Mildred has requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more seafood for resale. Mildred has been in this business for 17 years now. In the future, Mildred would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more seafood for resale

loans.name: Maura Del Carmen

texts.es: Maura de 38 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia en compañía de sus 4 hijos de 1, 4, 6 y 12 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de calzado para dama en su pequeño negocio con el que ha sacado adelante a sus hijos brindado los insumos necesarios para su crecimiento y desarrollo además de proporcionar los servicios básicos del hogar. Maura desea invertir en su negocio comprando más cantidad de productos que le permitan diversificar su negocio y ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: la compra de zapatos, sandalias en variedad de estilos, para ofrecerle mejor variedad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en: Maura, 38 years old, lives in her own house with her 4 children, ages 1, 4, 6, and 12. She is a hard-working woman who works selling women's shoes in her small business, with which she has gotten her children ahead, offering the necessary supplies for their growth and development in addition to providing the basic household utilities. Maura wants to invest in her business purchasing a larger quantity of products which allows her to diversity her business and offer more product variety to her customers. For this, she asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in the purchase of shoes and sandals in a variety of styles to offer a better variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of shoes and sandals in a variety of styles, to offer to her customers.

loans.name: Las Lideres Group

texts.es:
Petrona continúa con su negocio de venta de ‘Patasca’ -comida tradicional- (primera de la derecha, viste blusa lila). El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió comprando mesas y sillas para que sus clientes coman, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque trabajó constantemente. Actualmente la banca sigue unida, sus negocios mejoraron en ventas, pudieron comprar materia prima y realizaron el pago de servicios o mejoraron sus ambientes de trabajo. Su negocio sigue teniendo buenas ventas porque la ‘patasca’ no pasa de moda, los muebles que compró son livianos de peso y fáciles de acomodar eso le ayuda a la hora de abrir y también al finalizar para limpiar, “mi trabajó aumentó con la llegada de nuevos clientes, los víveres se agotan más rápido…” comenta. Su negocio es exitoso porque el precio de la comida es accesible para su público. La ventaja ad e su negocio es que cuenta con clientes diarios, la desventaja es la falta de un frízer dónde conservar los alimentos frescos. Su sueño es tener un puesto de venta en el mercado de su barrio, ella desea comprar un frízer para congelar la carne. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que realiza esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Petrona solicita un préstamo para compra un frízer para congelar la carne y otros alimentos.
texts.en:
Petrona continues her business of selling 'Patasca' - traditional food - (first on the right, wearing a lilac blouse).

She invested the loan she obtained by buying tables and chairs so her customers could eat. The re-payments were made on time because she worked constantly. Currently the bank remains united and its businesses have improved their sales. They were able to buy raw materials and pay for services or improve their working environments.

Her business continues having good sales because 'la patasca' is a staple dish. The furniture she bought is light weight and easy to accommodate which helps when opening up and also at closing time when cleaning, "My worked increased with the arrival new customers, supplies run out faster ... " she says.

Her business is successful because the price of food is affordable for her customers. The advantage of her business is that it has regular customers but the disadvantage is the lack of a freezer to keep food fresh. Her dream is to have a stall at the market in her neighbourhood and she also wants to buy a freezer in order to freeze meat. This is the 2nd round of loans in three years with institution that is responsible for this activity.

It is for these reasons that Petrona is applying for a loan to buy a freezer in order to freeze meat and other foods.

loans.use: to buy a freezer in order to freeze meat and other foods.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.
